mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectCsoCnsltClHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ CNSLT_ADMIN_ID , CNSLT_DT , CL_TP_CD , CSTMRTEL_NATION_NO , CSTMRTEL_AREA_NO , CSTMRTEL_TLOF_NO , CSTMRTEL_TLOF_WTHN_NO , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM CSO_CNSLT_CL_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND CNSLT_ADMIN_ID = #{cnsltAdminId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND CNSLT_DT = #{cnsltDt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
